text: Kang Dong-ho (born August 17, 1985) is a South Korean actor. Kang is most active in musical theatre, notably in Grease and Goong: Musical. He has also starred in television dramas such as Twinkle Twinkle (2011), Wild Romance (2012) and My Husband Got a Family (2012). == Theater == {| class="wikitable" style="width:600px" |- ! width=10|Year !
